fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-The same player cannot be Hacked twice
-Hacked players will have one of their abilities locked (unusable) at random.
-This ability will remain locked while the Hacker is alive, and will unlock when the Hacker dies.
-The Hacker will gain 1 charge of the locked ability.
-The Hacker is capable of taking two actions each night- this can be 2 Hacks, a Hacked ability and a Hack, or 2 Hacked abilities
-Hacking cannot lock factional abilities or chats.
-The Hack action is Astral.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Survive + A Majority of surviving players are hacked at game end
